full_summary:
**SSC’s Strategic Roadmaps Industry Day**
### Information Overview

*   **Reference Number**: cb-453-75981173
*   **Solicitation Number**: SRID2023-24
*   **Publication Date**: November 20, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 1, 2023, 17:00 EST (Expired)
*   **Industry Day Description**:
Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites interested organizations to attend an Industry Day for SSC’s Strategic Roadmaps on January 11th, 2024, between 2:00-3:00 (EDT). To register, please submit the following information by December 1st, 2023, 17:00 EST:
*   Subject: Strategic Roadmaps
*   Company name
*   Attendee names and contact information
*   Accessibility requirements (if required)

Registered attendees will receive a link to the meeting and presentation material no later than January 10th, 2024.
**Industry Day Details**

*   Event Date: January 11th, 2024
*   Event Time: 2:00-3:00 (EDT)
*   Event Registration Deadline: December 1st, 2023, 17:00 EST
*   Registration Email: enterprisevendorengagement-engagementdesfournisseurs@ssc-spc.gc.ca

### Contact Information

*   Name: Joséée Green
*   Email: josee.green@ssc-spc.gc.ca
*   Phone: (506) 875-4046
*   Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, National Capital Region (Ottawa, Ontario), K1P 0B6, Canada

### Attachments

*   Industry Day Agenda (English): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25056/agenda---roadmap-industry-day-en.pdf>
*   Industry Day Agenda (French): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25056/agenda---roadmap-industry-day-fr.pdf>

### UNSPSC Classification

*   Security and protection software (43233200)
*   Logiciels de sécurité et de protection (43233200) [French]
